H0.text: Which mountain range stretches from the Arctic Ocean to the Caspian Sea. Caucasus Mountains

H1.text: Which mountain range stretches from the Arctic Ocean to the Caspian Sea. Altai Mountains

H2.text: Which mountain range stretches from the Arctic Ocean to the Caspian Sea. Tian Shan

H3.text: Which mountain range stretches from the Arctic Ocean to the Caspian Sea. Urals

A4.text: The Ural Mountains run from the coast of the Arctic Ocean to the river Ural and northwestern Kazakhstan.

A5.text: The Ural Mountains extend about 2,500 km from the Kara Sea to the Kazakh Steppe along the border of Kazakhstan.
